des: "A definite crowd pleaser, and not too spicy for those who usually shy away from chili or salsa dips.  Served with tortilla chips.  Best served warm, but still retains a good dipping consistency when cold or at room temperature. This dip can be served in a "bread bowl" (a hollowed out round loaf)."
ins: Mix cream cheese, processed cheese food, salsa, and chili in a large saucepan over a medium-low heat. Stir until the mixture has melted and become well blended.
